dialogue.introduction: Yo! I'm Asashimo, 16th Destroyer of the Yuugumo Class. Please remember. Don't forget about me... ok?
dialogue.library_intro: I'm the 16th Destroyer of the Yuugumo Class, Asashimo. Remember it well. I made my debut when the war situation got worse. I ran about freely at the front lines of the end stage. I did...all I could!
dialogue.secretary2: Ah, you can leave it to me. I'm fine with escorts or even nighttime raids!
dialogue.secretary3: Cut it out, Kiyoshimo! I told you to stop!... Wait, that's the commander! You better prepare yourself! Put your hands against the wall! Here I go!
dialogue.secretaryidle: ...Hey, if you're leaving me alone like this, you must have something else important to do, right? I don't like it... but, I forgive you!
dialogue.secretarymarried: What's the matter, admiral? You look down. Alright! I'll perk you up. Hmm? Want me to sing a song? Hmm?
dialogue.wedding: Hey, admiral. Do you have business with me? What is it, can it be resolved by asking someone else? What, a ring? Wow it looks good! I'll take it! It's alright isn't it â™ª
dialogue.show_players_score: Report huh? Must be important... Here
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Asashimo of the 31st Destroyer squadron! Move out!
dialogue.equipment1: Oh, you're very thoughtful! Good good!
dialogue.equipment2: I don't want to be not prepared, upgrade are welcome!
dialogue.supply: Oh, thanks a bunch! Fuel and ammo are important, after all!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Well... it's really just a scratch! Yeah.
dialogue.ship_construction: Looks like a new ally's arrived--
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet's back safely! Stop looking so relieved!
dialogue.start_a_sortie: It's my turn huh... well there's no going back! Destroyer Asashimo! Move out!
dialogue.battle_start: So it has started. Assault commence!
dialogue.attack: Tsk, you are quite a loud bunch... how 'bout this!
dialogue.night_battle: A night battle, huh, nice, it brings me back! We're charging in--! Follow after me!
dialogue.night_attack: Asashimo will take you on! More! Even more! Bring it!!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Asashimo will take you on! More! Even more! Bring it!!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Asashimo will take you on! More! Even more! Bring it!!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Asashimo will take you on! More! Even more! Bring it!!
dialogue.mvp: All right! I'm the best! Well, despite appearances I am the ace after all, so leave it to me.
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Tskkk...! Nah nah I can still fight!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Damn, I got hit! Engine is... fine! Then I can still fight! I can continue!
dialogue.sunk: Heh, You've come to be dependent on me... Well, fine by me... Kiyoshimo, everyone... we'll meet... again
dialogue.valentines_day_2015: Valen....tine's? Jeez, this fleet has all sorts of weird holidays. Well, I do have some for you, though. Here!
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: All--right! Isn't today special! Alright, commander! Lets celebrate together! Hey!
dialogue.christmas_2015: Ooyodo, are you going? Then bring me, Kasumi, and Kiyoshimo along too. It's only natural, isn't it?
dialogue.new_year_2016: Commander, do take care of me this year too! New year, huh. Well, relying on me as usual is fine!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Setsubun doesn't seem bad to me. Aight, it's throwin' time...Oww, Kiyoshimo! Stop throwing at me!
